review: Makes any TV a SMART TV... very nice product for very little money - extremely easy to set up!
author: Donna M Iacoviello

review: This products gets super hot and runs apps really slow when compared to other devices that run apps.
author: brown3009

review: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE the Amazon Fire Stick!!!  ALL of your data can be viewed on your TV - awesome!  And it's half the price of Apple TV (which we bought for my in-laws for Christmas).
author: Vicki B.

review: I'm from Paraguay and I bought  the Fire TV Stick, I'm a little disappointed because many apps (such as movies (amazon app), etc.) are disabled for access  from Paraguay
author: Oscar

review: We're extremely pleased with the Fire Stick.
author: Susan MacKenzie

review: Pre-ordered this because of the Deal for prime members.  I had X-box units hooked up to all the tvs to stream.  I like the layout of this unit very much,  my daughter will only watch tv with the fire-stick now.  I am sorry I did not buy a couple at the intro price.
author: Detpete

review: Love it!  Easy to install.  Very user friendly.
author: Barbara Holzinger

review: very easy to use with great navigation. I am glad I bought it over its competitors.
author: J_T
